{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ubee |model=U10C022 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,cable modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=1.3 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 1.1 (slave) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand= |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=DOCSIS 2.0 |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=U10C022XX |default_ssid_regex=^U10C022[A-F0-9]{2}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=user |default_pass=user |oui=F0:7B:CB |oui_eth=F0:7B:CB |default_ch= }} [http://www.speedguide.net/routers/ubee-u10c022-wireless-emta-1756 On SpeedGuide.net] :Default credentials for this device are per SpeedGuide.net.
The default SSID pattern is presumed to be '''U10C022XX''' (where '''XX''' consists of two upper case hex digits) for at least some units.
